content: leave mc attached for the mc+1cc version continue with mc for the heel setup row 2 ws sl1 p 27 31 35 turn the previous beginning of round will be in the middle of the back of the leg row 1 rs *sl1 k1 repeat from * across remainder of heel flap stitches row 2 ws sl1 p 27 31 35 repeat row 1-2 another 13 15 17 times for a total of 28 32 36 row tip the easiest way to count row in a slip_stitch heel flap is by counting the row in one of the slip_stitch columns as these elongated stitches are easier to see when you have 14 16 18 row of slipped stitches your heel flap is done heel turn rs sl1 k 15 17 19 ssk k1 you will have 9 11 13 unworked stitches in this row turn ws sl1 p 5 p2tog p1 you will have 9 11 13 unworked stitches in this row turn row 1 rs sl1 k to 1 stitch before gap ssk k1 row 2 ws sl1 p to 1 stitch before gap p2tog p1 repeat row 1-2 until all stitches have been worked on the final rs row you will have a gap before the final stitch work this row as sl1 k to 1 stitch before gap ssk on the final ws row you will have a gap before the final stitch work this row as sl1 p to 1 stitch before gap p2tog you will have 16 18 20 heel stitches ©jenniferbeaulieu2024 patternforpersonaluseonly forquestions pleasecontactellyndriaknits@gmail com 5 gusset note there are two sets of gusset instructions one if a cc was used for the heel and one if the mc was used the same thing is happening in both sets of instructions except they start in a different place due to the mc being attached in different places the bor marker will reflect this difference if a cc was used for the heel cut cc turn sock to where mc is attached at the beginning of the instep depending on the type of needles you are using you may have to slip some stitches to get back to where the mc is waiting place bor marker at beginning of instep stitches setup round k instep stitches pick up and k 15 17 19 stitches along edge of heel flap k 16 18 20 heel stitches pick up and k 15 17 19 stitches along other edge of heel flap you will have 28 32 36 instep stitches and 46 52 58 stitches for the heel and gusset round 1 k across instep k1 ssk k to 3 stitches before instep k2tog k1 round 2 k all repeat rounds 1-2 until reaching your original total stitch count of 56 64 72 stitches you will have 28 32 36 instep stitches and 28 32 36 sole stitches on your next round remove bor k 36 48
